# GitHub Token Test Secrets (FAKE - for testing only)
# These are example patterns that match GitHub token formats but are NOT real tokens

# SEC003: GitHub Personal Access Token (classic) - ghp_ + 36 chars = 40 total
ghp_aBcDeFgHiJkLmNoPqRsTuVwXyZ012345678

# SEC004: GitHub OAuth Token - gho_ + 36 chars = 40 total
gho_xYzAbCdEfGhIjKlMnOpQrStUvWxYz0123456

# SEC005: GitHub Fine-Grained PAT - github_pat_ + 22 chars + _ + 59 chars
github_pat_11ABCDEFGHIJKLMNOPQRST_aBcDeFgHiJkLmNoPqRsTuVwXyZ0123456789abcdefghijklmnopqrstuvwxyzABC

# In code context
const token = "ghp_TestTokenAbcDefGhiJklMnoPqrStUvWx123";
const oauth = 'gho_OAuthTokenForTestingPurposesOnly99';

# Edge cases (should NOT match)
# Too short
ghp_abc123

# Wrong prefix
ghx_aBcDeFgHiJkLmNoPqRsTuVwXyZ0123456789

# Incomplete fine-grained (missing underscore section)
github_pat_11ABCDEFGH

# Just the prefix
ghp_
gho_
